name: Legendary Arcane
description: Legendary Arcane is an indie 4-player local platformer game. 8 unique mages, each with 6 widely different spells, learn and master those to fit your strategy and beat your couch opponents. Easy to play, steep mastering curve.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0GHZ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Pixel Shader 2.0 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 400 MB available space
